title: Common Sense Health Advice to Change Your Life
description:
Jillian and the team discuss whether society is becoming so PC we’re giving people permission to fall apart. Plus, common sense food and beverage choices for weight loss, and emails on food addictions, knowing when to see a doctor, and more!


Start your FREE 7 day trial for Jillian’s My Fitness App at https://go.jillianmichaels.com/WNt1rL7uyZ

Send us your brief question at jillianpodcast@gmail.com
